title: NASA-TLX Questionnaire
instructions: Please rate your experience performing the last task....
code: <script type='text/javascript'>const slider1 = document.querySelector('#slider_1'); slider1.addEventListener('click', () => slider1.classList.add('tapped')); const slider2 = document.querySelector('#slider_2'); slider2.addEventListener('click', () => slider2.classList.add('tapped')); const slider3 = document.querySelector('#slider_3');slider3.addEventListener('click', () => slider3.classList.add('tapped'));const slider4 = document.querySelector('#slider_4');slider4.addEventListener('click', () => slider4.classList.add('tapped'));const slider5 = document.querySelector('#slider_5');slider5.addEventListener('click', () => slider5.classList.add('tapped'));const slider6 = document.querySelector('#slider_6');slider6.addEventListener('click', () => slider6.classList.add('tapped'));document.addEventListener('submit', (event) => { if (document.querySelectorAll('.tapped').length !== 6) { event.preventDefault(); event.stopPropagation(); } for (let i = 1; i <= 6; i++) { let slider = document.querySelector('#slider_'+i);if (slider && !slider.classList.contains('tapped')) { let warning = document.querySelector('#slider_'+i+'_warning');if (warning) { warning.remove(); }const node = document.createElement('div');node.style = 'font-style: italic; color: red';node.id='slider_'+i+'_warning';node.innerText = 'Please rate your experience here.';slider.after(node);} else if (slider) {let warning = document.querySelector('#slider_'+i+'_warning');if (warning) { warning.remove(); }}} });</script>
